definitions.body: the left (NH id.; As. šumêlu; Ar. 4ima0lun (also 4ama0lun and 4a0’malun, 4ama0lun, semolo0 north wind); OAram. [[שמאל]], Palm. (sf.) [[סמלך]]; Syr. 40’m; √ dub., [[שאם]] + [[ל]] Nö:M 128 Hom:A. u. A. i. (1892), 21 Kö:ii. 1. 148, 405; (v. also Thes Dietr:Wortforschung 234), cf. Ar. 4ao0mah;un be unlucky, 4a0’am left, 4a0m,  north; sab. [[שאם]] north, unlucky  DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 29; Epigr. Denkm. Ar. Nos. 6. 7; other views in Sta:§ 299 Lag:BN 116);—[[שְׂמאׁל]] abs, Ge 13:9 +, cstr. Ge 48:13, 2Ki 23:8; [[שְׂמאׁול]] abs. Nu 20:17 +; sf. [[שְׂמאׁלֶָךָ]] 2Sa 2:21, [[שְׂמאׁלוֹ]] Ge 48:13 +, etc.;—opp. [[יׇמִין]] exc. Ge 14:15, Ju Jdg 19:27, 2Ki 23:8;—
= north (on left of one facing east, cf. [[אָחוֹר]]
